home.name: Name:
home.invite_: New here? Create a free account and get started: {{-link}}
home.inviteOrga_: Are you hosting an event? Here you can {{-link}}.

register.pwTooLong: Long passwords are good. But this??
register.failure: Creating user failed. Please try again.
register.serverCrowded: There are too many registrations at the moment. Please try again in 15 minutes.
register.warnEmail: Your username is publicly visible. Therefore, it is strongly discouraged to use an email address as your username.
register.githubSSOHint: Choose a username and get started.
register.githubPasswordHint: You can set a password later in your profile and login independently from GitHub.
register.discordSSOHint: Choose a username and get started.
register.discordPasswordHint: You can set a password later in your profile and login independently from Discord.

highscore.heading: Highscore
highscore.empty: There are no users in the highscore yet. Become the first!
highscore.name: Username

create.title: Create Room
create.information: You can use a room to create a local highscore for your event and use the session system. A session lasts 30 minutes, in this time users can solve challenges and gain points. After 30 minutes, the score is submitted to the local highscore. After the session, users can continue to work on the challenges as regular users.
create.keyInvalid: Only alphanumeric characters allowed in room key.
create.failure: Creating room failed. Please try again.
create.serverCrowded: There are too many room creations at the moment. Please try again in 15 minutes.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.content_: Please provide contact information according to the legislation of your country.

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.content_: Please provide legal information according to the legislation of your country.

profile.heading: Profile
profile.sessionReady: Session is ready. Solve a challenge to start it.
profile.discordLinkingNote_: Add your Discord account as an alternative login method. This way you can still login if you forget your password: {{-link}}

challenge.timeout: After 20 tries, you must pause for 30 seconds. Please wait {{sec}}s.
challenge.locked: You have not unlocked this challenge yet.
challenge.ratelimit: Hey {{name}}, you have requested more than {{requests}} pages within {{timespan}} minutes. Please wait {{waiting}} seconds before requesting pages again.

feedback.heading: How do you feel about the challenge?

delete.heading: Delete Account
delete.confirm_: Here you can permanently delete your account and your progress. This action can not be undone. Confirm it with your username:
